snippet: For many black Americans, Mr. Trump is a familiar figure whose candidacy is exposing to others the diminishing words they have heard their whole lives....
abstract: Black voters interviewed about Donald J Trump's 2016 presidential campaign say his offensive behavior, language and policy proposals reflect much of what they have experienced in American society for generations; recent CBS News poll reports Trump with just 4 percent support among black voters likely to cast ballots in November.
lead_paragraph: For many black Americans, Mr. Trump is a familiar figure whose candidacy is exposing to others the diminishing words they have heard their whole lives.

headline.main: Black Voters on Donald Trump: We’ve Heard It All Before
headline.print_headline: Black Voters on Trump: We’ve Heard It All Before
